data.name: CreateContractorHistory
DeleteContractorHistory
data.value: delete from CKT_CONTRACTOR_HST where IDENTIFIER = @identifier and FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE = @fkCktCseOrgatypeCode and FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fkCktCseOrgaorganztnId and FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE = @fk0CktCseOrgatypeCode and FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fk0CktCseOrgaorganztnId

data.name: DeleteCseOrganizationRelationship
data.value: delete from CKT_CSE_ORG_RELATN where COG_PARENT_CODE = @cogParentCode and COG_PARENT_TYPE = @cogParentType and COG_CHILD_CODE = @cogChildCode and COG_CHILD_TYPE = @cogChildType

data.name: ReadContractorHistory1
data.value: select IDENTIFIER, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTMP, EFFECTIVE_DATE, END_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTMP, FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID, FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID from CKT_CONTRACTOR_HST with(xlock) where @fk0CktCseOrgatypeCode = FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE and @fk0CktCseOrgaorganztnId = FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID and @fkCktCseOrgatypeCode = FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE and @fkCktCseOrgaorganztnId = FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID

data.name: ReadContractorHistory2
data.value: select IDENTIFIER, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTMP, EFFECTIVE_DATE, END_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTMP, FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID, FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID from CKT_CONTRACTOR_HST where FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fkCktCseOrgaorganztnId and FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fk0CktCseOrgaorganztnId order by IDENTIFIER desc

data.name: ReadContractorHistoryCseOrganization
data.value: select T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TIMESTMP, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.END_DATE, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTMP, T1.FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, T1.FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID, T1.FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE, T1.FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID, T2.NAME from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN T2 join CKT_CONTRACTOR_HST T1 with(xlock) on @fk0CktCseOrgatypeCode = T1.FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE and @fk0CktCseOrgaorganztnId = T1.FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID and T2.TYPE_CODE = T1.FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE and T2.ORGANZTN_ID = T1.FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID and T2.TYPE_CODE = 'X' order by T1.END_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCseOrganizationCseOrganizationCseOrganizationRelationship
data.value: select T3.COG_PARENT_CODE, T3.COG_PARENT_TYPE, T2.ORGANZTN_ID, T2.TYPE_CODE, T2.NAME, T3.REASON_CODE, T3.CREATED_TIMESTAMP from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN T2 join CKT_CSE_ORG_RELATN T3 with(xlock) on T3.COG_PARENT_TYPE = 'J' and T3.REASON_CODE = 'XJ' and T2.TYPE_CODE = T3.COG_CHILD_TYPE and T2.ORGANZTN_ID = T3.COG_CHILD_CODE and T2.TYPE_CODE = 'X' order by T3.COG_PARENT_CODE, T3.CREATED_TIMESTAMP desc

data.name: UpdateContractorHistory
data.value: update CKT_CONTRACTOR_HST set END_DATE = @endDate, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTMP = @lastUpdateTimestmp where IDENTIFIER = @identifier and FK_CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE = @fkCktCseOrgatypeCode and FK_CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fkCktCseOrgaorganztnId and FK0CKT_CSE_ORGATYPE_CODE = @fk0CktCseOrgatypeCode and FK0CKT_CSE_ORGAORGANZTN_ID = @fk0CktCseOrgaorganztnId
